error.en-gb: Oh my! Your details failed to send: {$1}
error.en-us: Doh! Your details failed to send: {$1}

body.en-gb: Thanks! Your details have been received and we'll get back to you soon!
body.en-us: Thanks! Your details have been received and we'll get back to you soon
body.es: ¡Gracias! Sus datos han sido recibidos y nos pondremos en contacto con usted pronto

title.en-gb: Seems like some fields are missing...
title.en-us: Seems like some fields are missing...
title.es: Seems like some fields are missing...

email.es: Tu dirección de correo electrónico no es válida.

honeypot.en-gb: Please leave the last field empty, we're using it to stop robots using the form.
honeypot.en-us: Please leave the last field empty, we're using it to stop robots using the form.
honeypot.es: Por favor, deje el último campo vacío, lo estamos utilizando para detener los robots usando el formulario.

size.en-gb: Your file(s) exceed the {$1}mb limit, please consider using a cloud based service like wetransfer.
size.en-us: Your file(s) exceed the {$1}mb limit, please consider using a cloud based service like wetransfer.
size.es: Su archivo (s) excede el límite {$1}mb, por favor considere el uso de un servicio basado en la nube como wetransfer .

type.en-gb: We don't allow the file type for {$1}.
type.en-us: We don't allow the file type for {$1}.
type.es: No permitimos que el tipo de archivo para {$1}.

failed.es: La carga de archivos no para

server_limit.en-gb: You've tried uploading a file bigger than your hosting provider has allowed in the php.ini file - please contact your hosting provider to confirm.
server_limit.en-us: You've tried uploading a file bigger than your hosting provider has allowed in the php.ini file - please contact your hosting provider to confirm.
server_limit.es: Usted ha intentado cargar un archivo más grande que su proveedor de hosting ha permitido en el archivo php.ini - por favor póngase en contacto con su proveedor de hosting para confirmar.

general.en-gb: There was an error with the file {$1}: {$2}
general.en-us: There was an error with the file {$1}: {$2}
general.es: Hubo un error con el archivo

bot.en-gb: You're Nicked Son! Google reCAPTCHA had a problem: {$1}
bot.en-us: FREEZE SUCKER! Google reCAPTCHA had a problem: {$1}

empty_response.en-gb:
The reCaptcha response from Google can't be accessed by process.php
Your hosting provider may be blocking cURL and/or file_get_contents() – please verify this with them.
Please contact us after you have spoken to your hosting provider
empty_response.en-us:
The reCaptcha response from Google can't be accessed by process.php
Your hosting provider may be blocking cURL and/or file_get_contents() – please verify this with them.
Please contact us after you have spoken to your hosting provider
empty_response.es:
La respuesta reCaptcha de Google no puede ser accedida por process.php
Es posible que tu proveedor de hosting esté bloqueando cURL/file_get_contents () - por favor, verifique esto con ellos. Por favor, póngase en contacto con nosotros después de haber hablado con su proveedor de alojamiento

back_link.en-gb: Go back a page to correct it.
back_link.en-us: Go back a page to fix it.
back_link.es: Ir atrás una página para corregirlo.
